name: ExportOptionsFlash

properties.name: exportStyle
properties.description: How should the Flash file be created.

properties.name: exportVersion
properties.description: Which version of SWF to export.

properties.name: frameRate
properties.description: When exporting layers to Flash frames.

properties.name: looping
properties.description: Should the Flash file be set to loop when run.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: Prevent the exported file from being imported by other applications.

properties.name: artClipping
properties.description: How should the arts be clipped during the output.

properties.name: curveQuality
properties.description: How much curve information should be preserved.

properties.name: imageFormat
properties.description: How should the images in the exported Flash file be compressed.

properties.name: jpegQuality
properties.description: Level of compression.

properties.name: jpegMethod
properties.description: What method to use.

properties.name: playbackAccess
properties.description: What access should the SWF file have - local or network access.

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: Pixels per inch.

properties.name: replacing
properties.description: If a file with the same name already exists, should it be replaced?

properties.name: convertTextToOutlines
properties.description: Should all text be converted to outlines.

properties.name: compressed
properties.description: Should the exported file be compressed.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color.

properties.name: backgroundLayers
properties.description: A list of layers to be included as the static background in all exported Flash frames.

properties.name: layerOrder
properties.description: The order in which the layers will be exported to Flash frames.

properties.name: blendAnimation
properties.description: Controls how the blend art objects are animated when export to Flash frames.

properties.name: ignoreTextKerning
properties.description: Should the kerning information for text objects be ignored.

properties.name: exportAllSymbols
properties.description: Should all symbol definitions in the palette be exported to the SWF File.

properties.name: preserveAppearance
properties.description: Choose whether to preserve artwork appearance or editability (default) during export.

properties.name: includeMetadata
properties.description: If true, include minimal XMP metadata in the exported file.

properties.name: saveMultipleArtboards
properties.description: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be exported.

properties.name: artboardRange
properties.description: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.

description: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document as an Flash (.SWF) file.
